content.value: Im a little disappointed @BootsUK I asked a staff member in the Holloway branch if they had any plasters for brown skin tones (as i know they have been introduced) she said it was “a little racist of me” to ask for brown skin toneplasters & suggested I get the clear plaster
content.html: Im a little disappointed @BootsUK I asked a staff member in the Holloway branch if they had any plasters for brown skin tones (as i know they have been introduced) she said it was “a little racist of me” to ask for brown skin toneplasters & suggested I get the clear plaster
